# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new buffer over the same memory as the given buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ bytes: UnsafeRawBufferPointer)
```

## Parameters

- **bytes**: The buffer to convert.
title: init(_:)
